content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: TSPARMCD
      operator: is_not_unique_set
      value:
        - DOMAIN
    - name: TSSEQ
      operator: is_not_unique_set
      value: TSPARMCD
Core:
  Id: CORE-000154
  Version: '1'
  Status: Published
Description: TSSEQ must be unique within TSPARMCD
Outcome:
  Message: TSSEQ is not unique within TSPARMCD
  Output Variables:
    - TSSEQ
    - TSPARMCD
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0268
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: Sequence number given to ensure uniqueness within
                  a dataset. Allows inclusion of multiple records for the same TSPARMCD.
                Document: IG v3.4
                Item: Specification
                Section: 7.4.2
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - TRIAL DESIGN
  Domains:
    Include:
      - TS

json.Description: TSSEQ must be unique within TSPARMCD

Outcome.Message: TSSEQ is not unique within TSPARMCD

Citations.Cited_Guidance: Sequence number given to ensure uniqueness within a dataset. Allows inclusion of multiple records for the same TSPARMCD.
